section1.heading: About
section1.foundermessage: Founded and organized by Aidan Salvi, angel investor, advisor, entrepreneur, and technologist who believes that the biggest things that prevent people from making life-changing decisions is the fear that comes with making Bold Moves. Having made many Bold Moves in his past, Aidan wants to bring insight into the process and internal mindset when making Bold Moves. Aidan wants to bring a different mindset to the productivity world which is more scientific and focused on progress and not deadlines and due dates.
section1.foundermessage2: Each person has a different pace at which to work. What should unite us is the nature that we are all taking steps forward and not the paces of the steps. Support the progress!

beboldarray.detail: Be Bold is a movement, a mindset, a support network, a book, a coaching platform, a process, a learning series, and a mobile app to help make bold transformative changes for personal growth and life changes.

beboldarray.subheading: The Be Bold platform is about creating the foundation to make actionable steps and executing decisions. The platform crafts tools and identifies networks of mentors and coaches to support those decisions.
The Be Bold mission is to challenge the conventional thinking, planning, and decision-making process for people that want to change, create change, or be great.

Be Bold is NOT about motivation. It IS about movement. It's about taking actionable steps to move beyond the fear. Be Bold is about tackling the inner fear to make a bold decision and take action that will be impactful.
The Be Bold movement identifies and gives visibility to the fundamental fear that prevents us from taking action(s) that will help reach our fullest potential.

thebeboldmomentarray.heading: Progress above movement.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading1: Being motivated is different than taking action.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading2: Progress, any progress, can be an inspiration for future progress. But being bold involves moving beyond “discussing” and “motivating” and into “doing”.

thebeboldmomentarray.heading: Death to Deadlines.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading1: Due dates create anxiety and negativity, which stalls progress. Be Bold creates a mindset that rewards and builds upon progress.

thebeboldmomentarray.heading: Focus, Health, Sleep.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading1: The focus is always the end result when making a Bold journey. The progression toward the goal, not the barrier(s) will help you stay focused.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading2: The Bold Movement journey relies on a routine of health and sleep to stay focused on forward progress.

thebeboldmomentarray.heading: Balanced Progress.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading1: A forward-thinking mindset is one of a balanced daily progression.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading2: Every day is an opportunity to make progress. Some progress is more noticeable than others and some progress may not look like progress at first.
thebeboldmomentarray.subheading3: Balanced progress is a holistic view of where you were and where you want to be and finding the right balance as you move forward

paras.para: A bold goal can be small or big, can take weeks or months to complete. But most Bold Moves usually have one small barrier that keeps us from executing on the move.
The Be Bold Movement reminds us it is important to say focused on the end result and the goal and not the barrier.
The Bold Movement singularizes one impact-focused question that will serve as the foundation for moving forward and staying focused.
One of the 3 Pillars of Be Bold Thinking is Forward Progress.
Be Bold is NOT about motivation it is about movement. Taking action and forward progress is movement.
Do. Don’t just talk about doing. When you move past the discussion stage and into the doing stage, progress is being made.
People like Bold Movement thinking because it is progressive and continually challenges you into a forward-thinking mindset.
Every day is an opportunity to make progress.
Bold Moves are personal to each person.
What defines a Bold Move? The factor or level of Boldness is very personal. But most Bold Moves have similar characteristics:
1) A Bold Move is a move that has been on your mind for quite some time but something is holding you back from execution. Usually the barrier an inner fear of some sort.

2) Bold Moves require additional work after taking the first action and take 5-6 months to realize true achievement, although a pillar of Be Bold thinking is not to live by deadlines. True achievement comes at different times for different people and goals.
3) Bold moves are pivotal and require one pivotal action to start the momentum. Identifying and conquering the big blocker may be obvious to some or could be hidden to others.
One of the 3 Pillars of Be Bold Thinking is to Surpass Fears.
Fearless People Think, Speak and Act differently than Fearful People.
It’s not the lack of desire but the fundamental fear that prevents us from taking the action to reach our fullest potential.
Tackle the inner fear to make a bold decision and take actionable, impactful steps that will be vital to moving beyond the fear. The action is at the center of attacking the fear.
You can be fearful and still move forward. And moving forward is to make progress daily.
The bold framework helps support making large changes in your life. These changes will help you become your best self.
You will continually tell yourself you don’t know but you will learn. If you learn everyday, you make progress.
Do not fear making a mistake. Mistakes are opportunities.

slider.heading: DEATH TO DEADLINES
slider.subtitle: Stay focused on progress not due dates.

paras.para: One of the 3 Pillars of Be Bold Thinking is that there are No Deadlines.
The bold framework helps outline key factors to success and creates a timeline, not a deadline, that is unique and personal to each situation.
Everyone progresses at different rates.
When you stay focused on progress, there are no due dates.  It is about making actionable and noticeable progress.
People like Bold movement thinking because it is easy to digest and understand.

Bold Movement Thinking has an all-encompassing and holistic focus on executable actions. As you transition to looking at the “larger picture” in a holistic way, the triggers of normal anxiety will be lessened.
Do not let others discourage you as you take bold moves. Those that discourage you will trigger the anxiety you are wanting to leave behind.

The Be Bold mission is to challenge the conventional thinking, planning, and decision-making process for people that want to change, create change, or to be great. As you encounter and successfully accomplish the change or changes you envisioned, your confidence in yourself and your future will build.
People like Bold Movement thinking because it relies on accountability for proper execution. Accountability in turns helps build confidence in your decision to continue to move forward.
Bold Movement thinking relies on support network(s) and resources to help understand and execute your Bold Moves.
Ask others for help during the journey and conversely share your knowledge with others.
